name: d3-scale
description: Encodings that map abstract data to visual representation.

scripts.test: TZ=America/Los_Angeles tape 'test/**/*-test.js' && eslint index.js src test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" dist/d3-scale.js -c -m -o dist/d3-scale.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-scale/dist/d3-scale.js d3-scale.v2.js && cp ../d3-scale/dist/d3-scale.min.js d3-scale.v2.min.js && git add d3-scale.v2.js d3-scale.v2.min.js && git commit -m "d3-scale ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j dist/d3-scale.zip -- LICENSE README.md dist/d3-scale.js dist/d3-scale.min.js
